sentences.en: All over the world, oil spills regularly contaminate coasts.
sentences.cn: 在世界各地，油溢出物经常污染着海岸。

sentences.en: Any harmful bacteria present in the raw meat juices could contaminate safely cooked food.
sentences.cn: 生食中任何有害的细菌都会通过汁液污染熟食的.

sentences.en: Are you brave enough to impeach or disclose the units or individuals that contaminate environment?
sentences.cn: 你有勇气检举、揭发污染环境的单位和个人 吗 ?

sentences.en: Bamboo grown near a busy road is no good because auto exhaust can contaminate the crop.
sentences.cn: 长在繁忙公路附近的竹子也不好,它们可能被汽车排放的废气污染.

sentences.en: DO NOT add any chemicals to the system piping which will contaminate the potable water supply.
sentences.cn: 不要在管道系统中添加任何可能会造成饮用水污染的任何化学物品.

sentences.en: Drinking water supplies are believed to have been contaminated.
sentences.cn: 据信饮用水已受到污染。

sentences.en: Hosts contaminate our tombs and crosses burn our skin.
sentences.cn: 入侵者污染我们的坟墓,十字架烧伤我们的皮肤.

sentences.en: Idling a vehicle can also contaminate engine oil and accelerate the deterioration of engine components.
sentences.cn: 停车不熄匙会加速引擎机油和机件的耗损.

sentences.en: It uses ( and can contaminate ) a lot of water.
sentences.cn: 它需要大量的水 ( 而且会把水污染掉 ).

sentences.en: Should these animals harbour viruses, they will contaminate the water and affect other native wildlife.
sentences.cn: 这些生物带有海港病毒, 有可能会污染水资源,影响其他生物的生存.

sentences.en: The lubricants and refrigerants of the machines will not contaminate the materials and the machine drums.
sentences.cn: 设备所用的润滑剂、冷却剂等不对物料或容器造成污染.

sentences.en: The sources of organisms that may contaminate the wound are numerous.
sentences.cn: 可以沾染伤口的细菌来源是很多的.

sentences.en: These substances contaminate paint, reducing its brilliance and smooth feel.
sentences.cn: 这些物质污染油漆, 降低光滑度.

sentences.en: We continually wage war on them, for they contaminate our food, carry diseases, devour our crops.
sentences.cn: 人类不断地同昆虫斗争, 因为他们污染食物, 传播疾病, 吞噬庄稼.

sentences.en: We have to constantly guard our heart and not allow and contaminate us.
sentences.cn: 人生在世,必须时时刻刻保守自己的心,不让这个世界的不义污染我们.

sentences.en: White cells contaminate the red cell and platelet components.
sentences.cn: 白细胞会“污染”红细胞和血小板制品.

trans.tran_cn: 污染，弄脏，毒害（人的思想或品德）
trans.tran_en: to make a place or substance dirty or harmful by putting something such as chemicals or poison in it
to make a place or substance dirty or harmful by putting something such as chemicals or poison in it
